text:
e="preserve">Jimmie Lee Solomon (March 11, 1956October 9, 2020) was an American lawyer and Major League Baseball executive. He was born in Trinity County, Texas. He was the Executive Vice President of Baseball Operations from 2005 to 2010. He later was the Executive Vice President for Baseball Development from 2010 to 2012.
Solomon was found dead on October 9, 2020 at his home in Houston, aged 64. The cause of death is unknown.
